recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper. 4. Combine everything.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.summary: A flavorful curry made with tender chicken pieces and aromatic spices.
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Cook chicken until tender.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.summary: A simple and nutritious toast with fresh avocado and toppings.
recipes.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado with lemon, salt & pepper. 3. Spread on toast and add toppings.
